com.p6spy.engine.proxy

Class GenericInvocationHandler<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.p6spy.engine.proxy.GenericInvocationHandler<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The class of the object which will be proxied
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.sf.cglib.proxy.Callback, net.sf.cglib.proxy.InvocationHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    P6LogConnectionInvocationHandler, P6OutageConnectionInvocationHandler

    public class GenericInvocationHandler<T>
extends Object
implements net.sf.cglib.proxy.InvocationHandler
    Base class for invocation handlers. This class is designed to be a generic implementation of the InvocationHandler interface which delegates the invocation of Delegate objects based on pattern matching against the method.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GenericInvocationHandler(T underlying)
      Creates a new invocation handler for the given object.

    • Method Detail

      • addDelegate

        public void addDelegate(MethodMatcher methodMatcher,
               Delegate delegate)
        Adds a delegate which will be used when a method is invoked that meets the following criteria:

        methodMatcher.match(method) == true

        Note: Adding a second delegate object with the same method matcher (according to MethodMatcher#equals(Object) and com.p6spy.engine.proxy.MethodMatcher#hashCode() will replace the previous delegate!
        Parameters:
        methodMatcher - The method matcher
        delegate - The delegate object

      • invoke

        public Object invoke(Object proxy,
            Method method,
            Object[] args)
              throws Throwable
        Specified by:
        invoke in interface net.sf.cglib.proxy.InvocationHandler
        Throws:
        Throwable

        protected T getUnderlying()

      • clearCache
